text: The Sanremo Music Festival 1955 was the fiftth annual Sanremo Music Festival, held at the Sanremo Casino in Sanremo, province of Imperia between 27 and 29 January 1955. The show was presented by television presenter Armando Pizzo, assisted by Maria Teresa Ruta. According to the rules of this edition every song was performed in a double performance by a couple of singers or groups, with some artists performing multiple songs.
